# Colophon {-}

This document is set in [EB Garamond](https://www.ctan.org/tex-archive/fonts/ebgaramond), [Lato](https://www.ctan.org/tex-archive/fonts/lato), [Source Code Pro](https://www.ctan.org/tex-archive/fonts/sourcecodepro).
The body text is set at 11pt with $\familydefault$. 

It was written in R Markdown and $\LaTeX$, and rendered into PDF using [stormdown](https://github.com/markanewman/stormdown) and [bookdown](https://github.com/rstudio/bookdown). 

This document was typeset using the XeTeX typesetting system and the [Harrisburg University Doctoral Studies class](https://harrisburgu.edu/andp-program-main/andp-core-req/) class created by [Rand Ford](https://harrisburgu.edu/andp-program-main/andp-fulltime-faculty/).
Under the hood, the [Harrisburg University LaTeX template](https://github.com/markanewman/stormdown) is used to ensure that documents conform precisely to submission standards.
Other elements of the document formatting source code have been taken from the [University of Washington Thesis LaTeX template](https://github.com/UWIT-IAM/UWThesis), the [Latex, Knitr, and RMarkdown templates for UC Berkeley's graduate thesis](https://github.com/stevenpollack/ucbthesis), and the [Dissertate: a LaTeX dissertation template to support the production and typesetting of a PhD dissertation at Harvard, Princeton, and NYU](https://github.com/suchow/Dissertate)

The source files for this dissertation, along with all the data files, have been organised into a reproducable which is available at https://github.com/user/repo.
A hard copy of the dissertation can be found in the Harrisburg University of Science and Technology library.

This version of the dissertation was generated on `r Sys.time()`.

The computational environment that was used to generate this version is as follows:

```{r echo = FALSE}
devtools::session_info()
```
